detail.description: IFB Industries Limited originally known as Indian Fine Blanks Limited started its operations in India in 1974 in collaboration with Heinrich Schmid AG of Switzerland. [1] It is engaged in the business of manufacturing diverse parts and accessories for motor vehicles etc. and home appliances products. [2]
